title: Migrating blue whales rely on memory more than environmental cues to find prey

title_detail.value: Migrating blue whales rely on memory more than environmental cues to find prey

summary: Blue whales reach their massive size by relying on their exceptional memories to find historically productive feeding sites rather than responding in real time to emerging prey patches, a new study concludes.

summary_detail.value: Blue whales reach their massive size by relying on their exceptional memories to find historically productive feeding sites rather than responding in real time to emerging prey patches, a new study concludes.
